mean_cn: n. 同等，等位，常态，票面价值，【体】标准杆数；  adj. 票面的，平常的，标准的
mean_en: the number of strokes a good player should need to complete a course or to hit the ball into a particular hole
sentence: The four major classical novels are on par with each other in Chinese literary circles.
sentence_trans: 四大名著在中国文学界中同彼此齐名。
